check-status-code.title: Default Check HTTP Code.
check-status-code.description: HTTP code to check against (default: comes from master partition).

check-frontend-ip.title: Space separated list of Frontend IPs to check
check-frontend-ip.description: List of Frontend IPs to check, if empty no constraint is used (default: comes from master partition).

check-certificate-expiration-days.title: Certificate expiration days check
check-certificate-expiration-days.description: Amount of days to consider certificate as being to-be-expired (default: comes from master partition).
